name: Bob Ross Adventure (Tunadel)
description:
"You need a little light to show dark, and dark to show light." ROSS, Bob.

Ok, the game is kind of unfinished, but i guess it's ok...

Please play the game in 600x480, or else the Ui elements get kind of crazy... Did not have time to fix that.

*Play with Sound.

Controls:

up - jump.
left - left.
right - right.
Space - Switch between Light and Dark
